comments.content: Can anyone identify the different fonts used on this card?

Sage the date: 2 /a, 3/e... All different so should be hand-drawn  
JULY 25, 2009/WE'RE HAVING A PARTY... CELEBRATE: [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20140428044139/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Avenir)  
invitation to follow: again, all repeating letters look different so should be hand-lettered
